Welcome to the Skeleton developed and used by Moosehead.studios.

This skeleton is a base representation of what we use to develop our websites for the varying degree of clients we serve.

The base Template has Modernizer, Normalize and JQuery built-in with some added Material design icons.

This Template does not include our propietery developed code or database links you see in some websites. Where appliciable taking copies of that code via reverse engineering will result in legal action taken against you.

The identities we develop for our Customers are hand crafted, each website will vary from the next with little to no code being re-used accross multiple clients. We pride ourselves on being one of the last business's still hand crafting websites, with some optimisations to update our techniques, the main examples being.

  • Modernizer -- Helping to reduce the problematic gap of incompatability between browsers and devices.
  • Normalize -- Helping make everything work the same on browsers., padding, widths, borders etc..
  • SASS -- Rapid prototyping of code.
  • Passionate coders. -- People that still like to code via hand. Not drag and drop builders.

We love code, We love people, We pride outselves or helping our clients (friends) achieve their goals with the freedom you require.

  • Don't like a colour mid way through development?
  • Got an idea near project completion?
  • Want something minor or major changed after a major sign-off stage?
  • Have a website that needs updating?
  • Have a drag and drop website, Wix? rapid Gator? that you want setup or tweaked?

You are welcome to use this Template as your require. Any changes made to this Template will be anounced via the main GIT page. Updates are unlikly to be frequent unless a need arises to update Libraries or add new features, to which an explination will be offered on the GIT wiki under "updating libraries"

Best Regards, the Moosehead.studio Development team. Any issues, You know what to do!
